title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2523.1 - Notice of initial legal regulated rent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2523.1 - Notice of initial legal regulated rent

State Regulations

Every owner of housing accommodations previously subject
to the City Rent Law and thereafter rented to a tenant on or after April 1, 1984, shall within 90 days after the commencement of the first tenancy subject
to the RSL, give notice in writing by certified mail to the tenant of each such
housing accommodation on a form prescribed by the DHCR for that purpose, reciting the initial legal regulated rent for the housing accommodation and the
tenant's right to file an application for adjustment of the initial legal
regulated rent within 90 days of the certified mailing to the tenant of the
notice pursuant to section
2522.3
of this Title. Compliance
with section
2528.2
of this Title shall also be
considered compliance with this section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2523.1

Amended

New

York State Register November 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 45, eff. 11/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
